• Developed an application utilizing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) by integrating OpenAI's Large Language Model (LLM) with FAISS, a high-performance vector database.
  • Enabled users to upload markdown files and interactively query the content, leveraging advanced NLP techniques for precise, context-aware AI-generated responses.
  • Designed the app to enhance user engagement and information retrieval by combining the strengths of generative AI with efficient vector-based search capabilities.

• Developed a Moroccan Arabic Dialect - English translator using natural language processing techniques to handle dialect-specific vocabulary and expressions.
  • Explored methods like optical character recognition (OCR) to extract data from old dictionaries, focusing on digitization and preprocessing.
  • Experimented with data cleaning and augmentation strategies to enhance the quality of training data for neural network models in NLP tasks.

• Developed a software solution for the automatic regulation of road traffic, aimed at optimizing traffic flow and reducing congestion.
  • Investigated the application of reinforcement learning techniques to dynamically determine optimal variable speed limits based on real-time traffic conditions.
  • Utilized the Open-Source Road Traffic Simulator (SUMO) to generate synthetic traffic data, enabling the training and evaluation of reinforcement learning models in realistic traffic scenarios.
